title: Slow cooked chicken korma
ingredients: ['2 onions, quartered', '3 garlic cloves', '4cm (1 1/2inch) fresh root ginger, peeled', '1 large chilli, seeds discarded', '8 boneless, skinless chicken thighs', '1 tablespoon sunflower oil', '25g butter', '1 teaspoon cumin seeds, crushed', '1 teaspoon fennel seeds, crushed', '4 cardamom pods, crushed', '1 teaspoon paprika', '1 teaspoon ground turmeric', '1/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '300ml (1/2 pint) chicken stock', '1 tablespoon sugar', '75ml double cream', '2 tablespoon ground almonds or cashews', 'pinch salt']
